name: Aztecian Arena
description:
Movement - WASD

Firing - Left Mouse

This game was supposed to feature a shop where you can upgrade the mask after every wave.  Shop can be interacted with but transactions are currently broken.

Art done by Fixx

Programming  Darexi  and Gonzako

Sound effects and music  by Jonchomosky

Art assets used:
